item.title: Dictionary of Data Structures in Python
item.description: Dictionary Definition One of the data structure in python. has key and value bined. You can fine value when you know the key very slimier with hashmap Data Structures in Python List Tuple Dictionary set declaration use { and } to declare the value can be list the key can be int or string. But not list. (TypeError: unhashable type: ‘list’) dictionary={"key1":"value1","key2":"value2","key3":"value3"} how to use indexing like List get() method difference between the indexing and get method If key does not exist, the indexing will return error.
